programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Seminole Hard Rock Casino in Hollywood, FL hosts our cash game while the players test out different eyewear at the table. Featuring Ian O'hara, Stewart Newman, Phil Laak, Noah Schwartz, Phil Hellmuth, Alec Torelli, David Silverman, Jeff Gross, Matt Seidman

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We head to Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, PA where our very own Chris Hanson becomes an honorary Kentucky Colonel. Plus, our crew tells the harrowing tale of #GroundPizza. Featuring Matt Glantz, Chris Horter, Mark Smith, Phil Laak, Dave Eldridge, Jennifer Harman, Tom Schneider

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: The locals in Pittsburgh show the pros how its done from Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, PA. Featuring Jennifer Tilly, Chris Horter, Nick Immekus, David Baker, Dan Wolf, Jennifer Harman, Jason Andrews, Dave Eldridge, Matt Glantz, Phil Laak, Tom Schneider, Mark Smith

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Poker Night in America makes its first visit to Thunder Valley Casino Resort just outside of Sacramento, CA. Featuring Mark Kroon, Maria Ho, Scott Ball, Phil Hellmuth, Alan Richardson, Lorrie Corvin, Mike Ross

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We continue our cash game from Thunder Valley Casino Resort, and as individual chip fortunes rise and fall some players realize their good fortune overall. Featuring Rep Porter, Maria Ho, Scott Ball, Phil Hellmuth, Alan Richardson, Bart Hanson, Mike Ross

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Some of Phil Hellmuth's best friends from Silicon Valley join our table at Thunder Valley Casino Resort. Featuring Anthony Pagan, Jason Calacanis, David Baker, Phil Hellmuth, Tom West, Chamath Palihapitiya, Taylor Paur

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: The poker action is non-stop, and so are the name drops from Thunder Valley Casino Resort. Featuring Matt Glantz, Jason Calicanis, David Baker, Phil Hellmuth, Bob Mather, Chamath Palihapitiya, Bart Hanson, Anthony Pagan, Maria Ho, Taylor Paur, Tom West

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: The stakes heat up as the night winds down at Thunder Valley Casino Resort. Featuring JC Tran, Mike Ross, Mark Bonsack, Phil Hellmuth, Keith Bowman, Bart Hanson, David Baker

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We conclude the poker from our first visit to NorCal and Thunder Valley Casino Resort. Featuring Mike Ross, Mark Kroon, JC Tran, Doug Lorgeree, Bart Hanson, David Baker, Maria Ho, Phil Hellmuth, Keith Bowman, Mark Bonsack

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We film cash game poker in the Paradise Live stage at the Seminole Hard Rock Resort in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Paul Harris, Jake Schindler, Samantha Abernathy, Mike Dentale, Mike Sigel, Joe DiPascale

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Jennifer Tilly meets a bunch of Mikes at our cash game table from the Paradise Live stage at Seminole Hard Rock Casino Resort in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Greg Marcus, Alex Rocha, Michael Laake, Jennifer Tilly, Mike Dentale, Mike Sigel, Joe DiPascale

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: From Seminole Hard Rock Casino Resort in Hollywood, Florida, Vanessa Rousso makes her first appearance on Poker Night along with some regulars to the show. Featuring Phil Laak, Vanessa Rousso, Matt Affleck, Jared Jaffee, Noah Schwartz, Alan Richardson, Glynn Beebe

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Phil Laak puts his chips in with "delicate, consistent, well-appointed strength" from Seminole Hard Rock Casino Resort in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Mukul Pahuja, Matt Salsberg, Matt Affleck, Phil Laak, Dan Shak, Esther Taylor, Asher Conniff

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Back by popular demand, we invited just the ladies to Seminole Hard Rock in Hollywood, Florida, for a night of poker with considerably less body hair around the table. Featuring Vanessa Rousso, Esther Taylor, Samantha Abernathy, Danielle Anderson, Abbey Daniels, Natasha Mercier, Stacey Sullivan

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Ladies Night III continues from Seminole Hard Rock in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Vanessa Rousso, Esther Taylor, Samantha Abernathy, Danielle Anderson, Abbey Daniels, Natasha Mercier, Stacey Sullivan

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We showcase cash game action from Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, PA. Plus, we do our first in-depth interview with Jennifer Tilly. Featuring Jennifer Tilly, Matt Glantz, Bobby Noel, Jack Schanbacher, Shaun Deeb, Maria Ho, Jason Andrews, Griffin Abel, Dave Eldrige

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, PA hosts our cash game while our invited pros start to play a little loose. Also, we show Part 2 of our in-depth interview with Jennifer Tilly. Featuring Matt Brady, Alec Torelli, Jennifer Tilly, Jack Schanbacher, Shaun Deeb, Daniel Wolf, Dave Eldridge, Matt Glantz, Bobby Noel, Jason Andrews

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Our pros go all the way to the river in our exclusive cash game from Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, PA. Featuring Patsy Altomari, Alec Torelli, Keith Morrow, Jennifer Tilly, Daniel Wolf, Matt Glantz, Griffin Abel

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Misty morning, clouds in the sky, without warning, the wizard walks by our cash game at Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh, PA. Featuring Claude Petroy, Alec Torelli, Keith Morrow, Jennifer Tilly, Daniel Wolf, Stepan Gusak, Griffin Abel, Patsy Altomari, Matt Glantz

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We visit the poker room at SugarHouse Casino in Philadelphia, PA, and rub elbows with some of the East Coast's most notable players. Featuring Greg Fishberg, Todd Brunson, Matt Glantz, Linda Kenney Baden, Mark Herm, Joe McKeehen, and Gajan Jeganathan

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We continue the poker party at SugarHouse Casino, with east coast grinders battling hand for hand in Philadelphia. Plus, we showcase the first part of our in-depth interview with the always-controversial Shaun Deeb. Featuring Todd Brunson, Linda Kenny Baden, Joe Mckeehen, Matt Glantz, Greg Fishberg, Yitong Wang, and Shaun Deeb

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Our second day of filming at SugarHouse Casino in Philadelphia, PA begins with some big hands and small needles. Featuring Matt Glantz, Todd Brunson, Jo Kim, Mike Sigel, Greg Himmelbrand, Shaun Deeb, Tony Reed, and Thai Ha

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: The poker spices up as the night winds down at SugarHouse Casino in Philadelphia, PA. Featuring Kyle Bowker, Todd Brunson, Akim Akimov, Mike Sigel, Matt Brady, Shaun Deeb, and Thai Ha

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We return to Hollywood, Florida to visit the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel and Casino, plus we showcase the first segment of our in-depth interview with Esther Taylor. Featuring Cate Hall, Jason Mercier, Jennifer Tilly, Stewart Newman, Wendeen Eolis, Esther Taylor, and Tim Reilly.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Jason Mercier makes a "donation" to the table as our first day of filming at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood, FL comes to a close. Featuring Cate Hall, Jason Mercier, Jennifer Tilly, Stewart Newman, Wendeen Eolis, Esther Taylor, and Tim Reilly

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We begin our second day of filming cash game action at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood, FL. Featuring Tom Marchese, Jessica Dawley, Matt Berkey, Jennifer Tilly, Dan O'Brien, Aaron Mermelstein, and Dan Suied

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Our exclusive cash game continues from Seminole Hard Rock from Hollywood, FL, with some tough cards hitting the community, but it seems to hit Joe Stapleton hardest of all. Featuring Tom Marchese, Jessica Dawley, Matt Berkey, Jennifer Tilly, Dan O'Brien, Aaron Mermelstein, and Dan Suied

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.sub-title: The Man With The Biggest Stack
programme.desc: Brad Garrett joins our table at Seminole Hard Rock in Hollywood, FL. Can he hold his own against the pros? He's certainly got a big enough chip stack! Featuring Brad Garrett, Jennifer Tilly, Jason Mercier, Kyle Bowker, Brandon Adams, Ryan Fee, and Eric Wasserson

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Jennifer Tilly goes full Jennifer TILTy as we conclude our filming at Seminole Hard Rock at Hollywood, FL. Featuring Eric Wasserson, Esther Taylor, Ryan Fee, Jennifer Tilly, Jason Mercier, Kyle Bowker, and Michael Laake

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We corral seven of California's poker elite at our cash game table hosted by Thunder Valley Casino Resort in Lincoln, CA. Featuring Lee Markholt, Kelly Winterhalter, David Sands, Phil Hellmuth, Harlan Karnofsky, Rep Porter, Keith McNair, and Bob Mather

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Our cash game continues from the beautiful Thunder Valley Casino Resort in Lincoln, CA. Featuring Lee Markholt, Kelly Winterhalter, David Sands, Phil Hellmuth, Jerry Utke, Matt Glantz, Rep Porter, Keith McNair, and Bob Mather

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We begin our second day of filming cash game action at Thunder Valley Casino Resort in Lincoln, CA, plus our players take a visit to a Top Golf facility to show off their driving chops. Featuring Matt Glantz, Tom Schneider, Kelly Winterhalter, Brad Garrett, Tony Bracy, Phil Hellmuth, and Harlan Karnofsky

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We conclude our epic cash game from Thunder Valley Casino in Lincoln, CA. Featuring Brad Garrett, Phil Hellmuth, Lee Markholt, Tom Schneider, Kelly Winterhalter, Tony Bracy, Rep Porter, and Jed Hoffman

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Phil Laak invents new poker terms during our first visit to Golden Nugget Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada. Featuring Joe Cada, Maria Ho, Greg Mueller, Greg Merson, Phil Hellmuth, Bill Lee, Liv Boeree, and Phil Laak

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We get some epic Hellmuth rants in this episode from Golden Nugget Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada. Featuring Joe Cada, Maria Ho, Greg Mueller, Phil Hellmuth, Brandon Cantu, Bill Lee, Liv Boeree, and Phil Laak

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: The outlook is good for our players as we begin our second day of filming at The Golden Nugget Casino in Las Vegas Nevada. Featuring Jim Carroll, Craig Casino, Stan Jablonksi, Jared Jaffee, Mario Orozco, Richard Roeper, and Brandon Cantu

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We close out the second day of our series from The Golden Nugget Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada with the best hands from the night. Featuring Jim Carroll, Craig Casino, Stan Jablonksi, Jared Jaffee, Mario Orozco, Richard Roeper, Matt Glantz, Mike Dentale, and Brandon Cantu

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We shake up the cast at our table as we begin our third day of filming from The Golden Nugget in Las Vegas, Nevada. Featuring Alan Richardson, Ryan Fee, Kyle Bowker, Jennifer Tilly, Cindy Kerslake, Bryn Kenney, and Esther Taylor

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Our players try and sift for those last few nuggets as the night winds down on our visit to The Golden Nugget Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada. Featuring Alan Richardson, Ryan Fee, Kyle Bowker, Jennifer Tilly, Cindy Kerslake, Bryn Kenney, and Esther Taylor

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We team up with our friends at partypoker to make our first trip to Canada! Playground Poker Club in Montreal is host to our high-stakes cash game, played by luminaries from the US, Canada, and the UK. Featuring Antonio Esfandiari, Sam Trickett, Francois Safieddine, Ouri Ohayon, Lauren Roberts, Rob Yong, and John Krpan

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: The pros at partypoker sling chips at nose-bleed stakes with their friends at Playground Poker Club in Montreal. Featuring Antonio Esfandiari, Sam Trickett, Francois Safieddine, Ouri Ohayon, Lauren Roberts, Rob Yong, and John Krpan

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: There are some wicked turn outs for the partypoker pros as the poker at Playground Poker Club in Montreal winds down on the first day of our visit. Featuring Antonio Esfandiari, Sam Trickett, Jeff Gross, Lauren Roberts, Rob Yong, and John Krpan.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We begin our second day at Playground Poker Club in Montreal, Quebec, and the pros from partypoker face off against some of the best players in North America. Featuring Antonio Esfandiari, Sam Trickett, Jeff Gross, Lauren Roberts, Rob Yong, and John Krpan.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Our second day of filming at Playground Poker Club draws to a close as the pros from partypoker try to draw to a straight. Featuring Antonio Esfandiari, Sam Trickett, Jeff Gross, Lauren Roberts, Rob Yong, and John Krpan.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Poker Night in America Ambassador Matt Glantz joins the partypoker table at Playground Poker Club in Montreal to see how he fares against poker luminaries from Canada and the UK. Featuring Matt Glantz, John Duthie, Mike Dentale, Rob Yong, Pascal Lefrancois, Samuel Chartier, and Elliot Smith.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: As our third day at Playground Poker Club in Montreal carries on, we showcase some hands we can't believe and some names we can't pronounce. Featuring Manig Loeser, John Duthie, Mike Dentale, Rob Yong, Pascal Lefrancois, Samuel Chartier, and Elliot Smith.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We conclude our final day of filming with the pros at partypoker at the Playground Poker Club in Montreal Featuring Manig Loeser, John Duthie, Jason Koon, Rob Yong, Pascal Lefrancois, Samuel Chartier, and Elliot Smith.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Our first day of high stakes cash kicks off at Choctaw Casino, where Kyle Bowker puts on a poker clinic and runs over this table full of sharks! Featuring Bart Hanson, Kane Kalas, Mike Ross, Kyle Bowker, David Baker, Douglas Lorgeree and Sean Mates.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.sub-title: The Butcher, The Baker, The Over Pair Maker
programme.desc: Can anything stop Kyle Bowker? Apparently not the sharks at this high stakes cash game. It's the secone half of day one here at Choctaw Casino in Durant, Oklahoma. Featuring Bart Hanson, Kane Kalas, Mike Ross, Kyle Bowker, David Baker, Douglas Lorgeree, Bobby Greeson and Sean Mates.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: It's the return of everyone's favorite poker degen to the Poker Night table: the Canadian sensation Gavin Smith! Witness his greatness for the start of day two here at Choctaw Casino in Durant, Oklahoma. Featuring Alec Torelli, Esther Taylor, Matt Glantz, Gavin Smith, Chan Pelton, David Baker, and Maxx Coleman

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: If watching infamous poker player Mike Dentale experience excruciating pain is your jam, then this episode is for you. It's part two day two at Choctaw Casino in Durant, Oklahoma. Featuring Alec Torelli, Esther Taylor, Mike Dentale, Gavin Smith, Chan Pelton, David Baker, and Will Berry

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: The Carrot Top of Poker, Jim Carroll, covers the table in comedic props, and Table Captain Gavin Smith is having none of it! This is Day 3 Part 1 at Choctaw Casino in Durant, Oklahoma. Featuring Jim Carroll, Alec Torelli, Abdyl Konjuhi, Gavin Smith, Matt Russell, Bart Hanson, and Tom Gray
